member.name: T:Aspose.Note.License
member.summary: Provides methods to license the component.
member.example:
In this example, an attempt will be made to find a license file named MyLicense.lic in the folder that contains
the component, in the folder that contains the calling assembly, in the folder of the entry assembly and then in the embedded resources of the calling assembly.
[C#]
License license = new License(); license.SetLicense("MyLicense.lic");
[Visual Basic]
Dim license As license = New license License.SetLicense("MyLicense.lic")

member.name: M:Aspose.Note.License.SetLicense(System.String)
member.summary: Licenses the component.

remarks.p: Tries to find the license in the following locations:
2. The folder that contains the Aspose component assembly.
3. The folder that contains the client's calling assembly.
4. The folder that contains the entry (startup) assembly.
5. An embedded resource in the client's calling assembly.
Note:On the .NET Compact Framework, tries to find the license only in these locations:
2. An embedded resource in the client's calling assembly.

member.example:
In this example, an attempt will be made to find a license file named MyLicense.lic in the folder that contains
the component, in the folder that contains the calling assembly, in the folder of the entry assembly and then in the embedded resources of the calling assembly.
[C#]
License license = new License(); license.SetLicense("MyLicense.lic");
[Visual Basic]
Dim license As License = New License license.SetLicense("MyLicense.lic") Can be a full or short file name or name of an embedded resource. Use an empty string to switch to evaluation mode.

member.name: M:Aspose.Note.License.SetLicense(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Licenses the component.
member.param: A stream that contains the license.

remarks.p: Use this method to load a license from a stream.

member.name: T:Aspose.Note.NumberFormat
member.summary: NumberFormat specifies the enum of numbering formats that can be used for a group of automatically numbered objects. Full list is specified here: https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/dd923798(v=office.12).aspx.

member.name: F:Aspose.Note.NumberFormat.DecimalNumbers
member.summary: Specifies that the sequence shall consist of decimal numbering. Example: 1, 2, 3, …, 8, 9, 10, 11, 12, …, 18, 19, 20, 21.

member.name: F:Aspose.Note.NumberFormat.UpperRoman
member.summary: Specifies that the sequence shall consist of uppercase roman numerals. Example: I, II, III, IV, …, XVIII, XIX, XX, XXI.

member.name: F:Aspose.Note.NumberFormat.LowerRoman
member.summary: Specifies that the sequence shall consist of lowercase roman numerals. Example: i, ii, iii, iv, …, xviii, xix, xx, xxi.

member.name: F:Aspose.Note.NumberFormat.UpperLetter
member.summary: Specifies that the sequence shall consist of one or more occurrences of a single letter of the Latin alphabet in upper case. Example: A, B, C, …, Y, Z, AA, BB, CC, …, YY, ZZ, AAA, BBB, CCC.

member.name: F:Aspose.Note.NumberFormat.LowerLetter
member.summary: Specifies that the sequence shall consist of one or more occurrences of a single letter of the Latin alphabet in lower case. Example: a, b, c, …, y, z, aa, bb, cc, …, yy, zz, aaa, bbb, ccc.

members.member:
Specifies that the sequence shall consist of sequential numbers from the Taiwanese counting system.
Example: 一, 二, 三, …, 九, 十, 十一, 十二, …, 十九, 二十, 二十一, …, 九十九, 一. ○○, 一○一.

Specifies that the sequence shall consist of sequential numbers from the Taiwanese counting thousand system.
Example: 一, 二, 三, …, 九, 十, 十一, 十二, …, 十九, 二十, 二十一, …, 九十九, 一. ○○, 一○一.

Specifies that the sequence shall consist of sequential numbers from the Chinese counting system.
Example: 一, 二, 三, …, 九, 十, 十一, 十二, …, 十九, 二十, 二十一, …, 九十九, 一. ○○, 一○一.

Specifies that the sequence shall consist of sequential numbers from the Chinese counting thousand system.
Example: 一, 二, 三, …, 九, 十, 十一, 十二, …, 十九, 二十, 二十一, …, 九十九, 一. ○○, 一○一.
